The Roost would be honored to provide our services for your next event. Each event is bespoke to your tastes and needs, to provide the best experience possible for you and your guests.
Catering Our Story 
The Roost

The Roost is a vision conceived by 3 men that have worked in the Food and Bev scene of Charleston SC for over 20+ years. They worked in many various places during the last two decades, but found a common ground when they put together the plans for The Roost.
Read more about us

Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel 
Review by - google

Lee T.:
five star review by 
This place rules. Recently moved to the area. Tried the Roost for a playoff game and the atmosphere is terrific. The club sandwich is EXCELLENT with a smokey flavor. The wasabi seared tuna was crazy good! 100% will go back.

Review by - google

Vance D.:
five star review by 
If you're in your 20's and 30's, this is a great place! Great music too. Just flew in to Charleston with 30 minutes before the New Year, found this place just a few blocks from my hotel just in time to celebrate!

Review by - google

Jennifer S.:
five star review by 
Really cool bar. Bartenders are super nice and friendly. I didn't eat there, but the wings from the group beside look so big and tasty. We asked, and they liked. Good prices and cold beer.

Review by - google

Jay W.:
five star review by 
A fun, local bar. Excellent food, friendly atmosphere and great cocktails / beer. The staff is always friendly and striving to make your experience a great one!

Review by - google

Averi M.:
five star review by 
The roost is a wonderful place to go. Our waitress was super nice and attentive. But the food, holy moly. The food was absolutely incredible. Everything was hot, fresh and delicious. The chef even came out personally and checked on us to make sure we were happy. The whole experience was fantastic.
